headline: Gold Swings And Fed Jitters Reframe Newmont’s Risk And Reward Profile
summary: Gold prices recently broke all time highs, lifting attention on NYSE:NEM and other major miners. A sharp reversal followed after expectations grew that Kevin Warsh could become the next Federal Reserve chair. The policy signal coincided with a selloff in gold and precious metals equities, highlighting how quickly sentiment can shift. Newmont, listed as NYSE:NEM, is one of the largest gold producers globally, so sharp swings in the gold price tend to feed directly into expectations for its...
